channel.title: holidays on Carl's New Website
channel.description: Recent content in holidays on Carl's New Website

item.title: Reality Christmas
item.description: New beginnings My group at work recently got moved to a different department. I don’t necessarily view it is a bad thing, but it certainly wasn’t expected. Being moved from Investments into Risk Management almost certainly makes sense given the type of work that we do, I get to keep my manager who is amazing and his new boss is somebody I haven’t worked with before, but I knew socially when he worked on our floor and is a pretty good guy.
